name: Shadow Silk
description: Hurl webs to ensnare your foes, reducing the Movement Speed of enemies in the area by 50% and dealing 1799 Physical Damage. After 10 seconds the webs explode, dealing 2399 Poison Damage to enemies within.  A ranged ally can activate the Black Widows synergy, dealing 2249 Poison Damage to them and summoning a spider to attack for 10 seconds. The spider bites enemies for 673 Physical Damage and can poison them for 4488 Poison Damage over 10 seconds.
effectLines: The synergy summons a more powerful spider, which deals additional damage over time.
